channel.title: Comments on: Is Outreach Judaism like Tribbles?
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Izgad
item.dc:creator: Izgad
item.description: I have read Patience with God and Crazy for God, which is his autobiography. It is the sort of “Godol” biography that I would love to see written in our community. He throws his punches at his parents, but still keeps them human.
item.content:encoded: I have read Patience with God and Crazy for God, which is his autobiography. It is the sort of “Godol” biography that I would love to see written in our community. He throws his punches at his parents, but still keeps them human.

item.title: By: Yonatan
item.dc:creator: Yonatan
item.description: Frank Schaeffer is not a nice person. Read his latest book about his mother. It's just wrong.
item.content:encoded: Frank Schaeffer is not a nice person. Read his latest book about his mother. It’s just wrong.

item.title: By: Izgad
item.dc:creator: Izgad
item.content:encoded:
“The artile asks at what point are they no longer just silly”

article

Have you read any Frank Schaeffer? He is the son of the late Francis Schaeffer. He left the Evangelical world and become Greek Orthodox and now likes to blast Evangelicals for these sorts of things.
